Text: Does my Xbox has to be modded for that ?
In my opinion, to play the demo's from xbox live you don't need modded console, so you just put it on usb using usbxtaf or horizon and play.

How do I make this demo work? 
I put the demo file in Content 000000000000000 using usbxtaf in my usb but it shows up as a corrupted demo on the xbox.

It looks like that this upload is not working propertly i am verry sorry about that, the only solytion is not to download this and wait till is free on xbox live and then download it, again i am verry sorry about this
If there is any one who can confirm that this work please let us know.
